SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM campingCar c
JOIN ( SELECT carNum,start_date,end_date,orderNum FROM carReservation WHERE end_date > SYSDATE AND end_date >= TO_DATE(#{start_date},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{end_date},'yyyy-mm-dd') >= start_date ) r ON c.carNum=r.carNum
carShow = 1
AND carSize = #{carSize}

SELECT c.carNum, carName, carSize, thumbnail, discountRate, carShow, carMaxNum, sleepNum, content, petOrNot, description, caravanNum, weekCost, wkndCost, carBirth FROM campingCar c JOIN carDetail d ON c.carNum = d.carNum
AND c.carNum NOT IN ( SELECT carNum FROM carReservation WHERE end_date > SYSDATE AND end_date >= TO_DATE(#{start_date},'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{end_date},'yyyy-mm-dd') >= start_date )
carShow = 1
AND carSize = #{carSize}
ORDER BY d.carNum DESC

SELECT c.carNum, c.carName, c.carSize, c.thumbnail, c.carShow, c.discountRate, c.carMaxNum, c.sleepNum, c.content, c.petOrNot, c.description, c.reg_date, caravanNum, weekCost, wkndCost, carBirth FROM campingCar c JOIN carDetail d ON c.carNum = d.carNum WHERE carShow = 1 AND c.carNum = #{carNum}
SELECT carImagenum, imageFilename, d.caravanNum, c.carNum FROM addImagefile a JOIN carDetail d ON a.caravanNum = d.caravanNum JOIN campingCar c ON d.carNum = c.carNum WHERE c.carNum = #{carNum}
SELECT * FROM carOption o JOIN carDetail d ON o.caravanNUM = d.caravanNum JOIN campingCar c ON d.carNum = c.carNum WHERE c.carNUM = #{carNum}
